description: Two origins have been suggested, although there is no solid evidence for either:

entries.meaning: (dated) A hackney coach driver [17th and 18th centuries].
(Ireland) The driver of a jaunting car.
examples: [â€¦]  Dublin residents, like those jarvies waiting news from abroad, would tempt any ancient mariner who sailed the ocean seas to draw the long bow about the schooner Hesperus and etcetera.
